item.title: Trump mulls semiconductor levies after lifting reciprocal tariffs on electronics

item.title: Rory McIlroy wins the Masters, becoming the 6th golfer to achieve a career Grand Slam
item.description: In a dramatic playoff on Sunday, McIlroy defeated Justin Rose to win all four major titles in golf, joining the esteemed ranks of Gene Sarazen, Ben Hogan, Gary Player, Jack Nicklaus and Tiger Woods.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Suspect arrested after fire at Pennsylvania Gov. Josh Shapiro's residence, police say
item.description: Cody Balmer, 38, jumped the fence outside the Governor's Residence in Harrisburg early Sunday morning and set a fire, Pennsylvania State Police say. Fortunately, Shapiro and his family escaped injury.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Convalescing Pope Francis opens Holy Week with greeting in St. Peter's Square
item.description: A convalescing Pope Francis greeted the crowd in St. Peter's Square on Palm Sunday, in yet another reassuring public sign of his recovery from a life-threatening battle with double pneumonia.
